a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Gender gap in primary, secondary and tertiary education, World
Share of boys or girls within the relevant age group who are enrolled in primary, secondary, and tertiary
Data source: Multiple sources compiled by World Bank (2024); Lee and Lee (2016); UNESCO Institute for Statistics (2024)
Note: This is given as the 'gross' rate, which includes children of any age entering the level of education; this can result in percentages
greater than 100 because children may enter education late or repeat a year.
